venue.name: Health Alliance MRI Center - Burbank Campus

item.description:
Thank you in advance for making this a nice experience for everyone.

Please arrive and be ready to go at 4:00 pm.

Please, pretty please do not leave valuables in your car.....

No need to tell us if you can't attend UNLESS your status changes after you have already signed up and can not attend.

Thanks so much , and can't wait to meet you!

Flat Rock Wildlife Sanctuary

This area contains several reservoirs, a brook and many beautiful trails.  There are several historical sites including an old homestead cellar-hole and a small graveyard.

We will be exploring some of these trails. Our 4 mile hike will bring us through pine and hemlock groves, past an old cellar-hole, areas undergoing selective cutting, past 2 secluded reservoirs, and down along the Falulah Brook.  The terrain has some rolling hills but no steep climbs. We estimate the hike to take 2.5 hours.

A Trail Map can be found at:

http://www.scribd.com/full/49412057?access_key=key-1jtz3t006eyf5nzgm2lz

Parking: Once you reach the hospital, proceed up the hill and stay to the right.  Go past Urgent Care and the Smoke Stacks. We will meet at the trail kiosk at the far end of the parking lot.

Bug spray and appropriate dress will help for the ticks / bugs... and please don't text while hiking! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Right past Urgent Care ( two large smoke towers) to parking kisok

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: An Adventure at Flat Rock...come join us!
